member_organisations:
XBRL Europe is affiliated to XBRL International and promotes XBRL in EUROPE, with 29 MEMBERS in 2018: 
Its XBRL jurisdictions and European institutions and Federations members: XBRL BE, DK, GE, FIN, FR, IT, NL, SE, SP, UK and The European Federation of Financial Analyst Societies (EFFAS) 
Its PREMIUM Members: EY EMEIA, Invoke, THEIA by Juliet sterwen 
Its SILVER members: Fujitsu Poland EMEA, Infogreffe, BR-AG Poznan, Atos International, AxiomSL, UB Partners, GPM Systemy, Certent, MerillCorp, Workiva, Vizor, Datatracks, AnuboXBRL, TESH Advice and Reporting Estandard SL
fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
Transparency directive 
Accounting directive 
Supervisory reporting in Banking, Insurance and Financial markets sectors 
Annual accounts reporting 
Tax authority reporting 
Data protection
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: XBRL Europe is an international non profit organisation (association internationale sans but lucratif) based in Brussels, set up to foster European XBRL efforts and to implement common XBRL projects in Europe between its members and to liaise with European Authorities and organisations.
